channel.title: My Server doesnt work for mac/windows 7
channel.description:
okay, so my server works for ME, but anyone who has mac/windows7 cannot connect. I have like 7 people on server, and they all have older versions of windows. I am using deltascape a 317 server.
helps appreciated

item.title: My Server doesnt work for mac/windows 7
item.dc:creator: @DarienM DarienM
item.description:
@DarienM wrote:

yeah, well did THAT. but like i said it doesnt work for mac, or windows 7, you did help me out though. so mac’s dont work correctly for private servers. okay but why do my friends (with windows 7) not able to connect?

Read full topic
item.source: My Server doesnt work for mac/windows 7

item.title: My Server doesnt work for mac/windows 7
item.dc:creator: @Jingojohn Jingojohn
item.description:
@Jingojohn wrote:

imants100:

figure out what jdk u have, lets say you have 15, then right click run in the client and click edit, then if the path in there says like 14, make it 15

That’s only for the compiler.

Read full topic

item.title: My Server doesnt work for mac/windows 7
item.dc:creator: @DarienM DarienM
item.description:
@DarienM wrote:

i searched but theres no ‘setserver’ in my client.java, i did however find local host, but i dont know what to do with it

Read full topic
item.source: My Server doesnt work for mac/windows 7

item.title: My Server doesnt work for mac/windows 7
item.dc:creator: @Jingojohn Jingojohn
item.description:
@Jingojohn wrote:

Is the client set to localhost? If so, tell them to go into client.java, search for ‘setserver’ and change “localhost” or “127.0.0.1” to “your server IP”

Read full topic
